ITEM.TEXT: 小小大星球™ 布娃娃也賽車

DESCRIPTION.BODY:
LittleBigPlanet™ Karting has taken over Home Square!
Home Square is filled with LittleBigPlanet™ Karting now!
It’s worth checking it out because 7 fantastic rewards (2 head costumes (Men&Women) / 2 Locomotion items / 1 companion) are waiting for you!
Also don’t forget to check out the trailer at Auditorium 4 in PlayStation®Home Theatre!
Home Square現已改造成「小小大星球™ 布娃娃也賽車」風格！\nHome Square現在完全被「小小大星球™ 布娃娃也賽車」所改造！值得您去造訪一趟，因為您可獲得7個精美獎品道具！其中包括2個頭部裝飾(男女用)、2個擴充活動功能道具、及1個隨身夥伴。\n最後也別忘記要在戲院4觀賞此遊戲的影片喔！

ITEM.TEXT: 逆轉騎士超級無敵任務

DESCRIPTION.BODY: Watch the trailer of new released game - “Invincible Knight” - and get special reward item!\nGet special rewards to celebrate the release of "Invincible Knight"!\nTo get the rewards, activate the quest - "Invincible Knight Super Invincible Quest" – at the activity board and then go to Auditorium1 in PlayStation®Home Theatre and watch the trailer!
看新遊戲的「逆轉騎士」的預告片，並取得特別獎品道具吧！\n取得「逆轉騎士」的特別獎品道具來慶祝本遊戲的發售！\n欲得到本獎品道具的話，請先去活動公佈板開始「逆轉騎士超級無敵任務」，之後再到戲院1去觀賞預告片。

New things have been added to Mass Media's Hot Zone.
Check out brand new minigame and rewards!
・Try brand new minigame "Hot Rocks!"
・Check out top ranking players for Hot Zone with "Hot Zone Leaderboards"!
・Get the minigame, "Hot & Bothered" for 75,000 Hot Zone Points, and you can play at your personal space!
More of new additional rewards are awaiting you so visit Hot Zone and find out what they are!
You can't take your eyes off Mass Media's ongoing updates!

Mass Media的Hot Zone有更新了！
去看看全新的遊戲和獎品道具吧！
去玩看看最新的遊戲「Hot Rocks!」
透過「Hot Zone熱門區排行榜」看看哪個玩家有得高分吧！
用75,000點Hot Zone積分來取得「Hot & Bothered」遊戲，之後便能在您的個人空間裡遊玩！
有其他許多獎品道具等著您，所以趕快過去Hot Zone看看到底是什麼吧！
您絕對不能錯過Mass Media的持續更新！

Get special rewards to celebrate the release of "Sports Champions 2"!
To get the rewards, activate the quest - "Sports Champions 2" Rewards - and then go to Sportswalk and finish watching the trailer at either of the two big screens there!
How easy is that!?
Oh, don't forget to play some games while you are there!
Please note:
You might not receive the rewards if you go away from the screen immediately after you finish watching the trailer.

取得特別獎品道具來慶祝「Sports Champions 2」的發售吧！
欲取得獎品道具的話，請先開始「Sports Champions 2」獎品道具任務，之後移動至運動大道，並在其中一個大螢幕前面觀賞預告片。如此簡單！
也順便在那裏玩點遊戲吧！
請注意：
觀賞預告片後立刻離開螢幕附近的話，您可能沒辦法收到獎品道具。

Vote now!
Submission period ended on November 14th.
The official announcement of the top 10 winners and the display of their creations will be available at PlayStation®Home Theatre from December 5th.

URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com

URL: https://halloween.sony-asia.com
Check them out and find your favorite!\nAvailable now!
趕快確認並找出您最喜愛的商品吧！\n現在熱賣中!
New items from Lockwood!\nIntroductory offer bundles are available for 2 weeks with a 33% discount!
Lockwood推出了新商品！\n上市紀念組合包只販賣兩星期！別錯過這個打6.7折的機會！

ITEM.TEXT: F.U.B.A.R (Fight Until Blood And Ruin) items!

DESCRIPTION.HEADER: F.U.B.A.R (Fight Until Blood And Ruin) items!
DESCRIPTION.BODY: Available now!
現在熱賣中!

Through their nRage space nDreams brings you licensed outfits from one of the most iconic movies of all time this week; Terminator 2: Judgment Day. Look and move like The Terminator and T-1000 in different states of repair mirroring the movie.\nThere are also Sarah Connor outfits, a full Terminator 2 Bundle including all items available and clothing items including Terminator 2: Judgment Day t-shirts and hoodies for super fans.
nDreams透過nRage大廳，為您呈現經典電影「Terminator 2: Judgment Day」的授權道具。您可打扮得跟電影畫面中出現的終結者和T-1000一樣，甚至讓自己跟他們做同樣動作。\n這些道具還有莎拉康納套裝，以及含有T恤和連帽外套等所有Terminator 2道具的終極組合包，專門為忠心粉絲呈現。
